name: MetaNote: Monster Baby
description:
This music game is about parents staying awake and fighting against several mystery monsters from the dark world for weeks. Those monsters willing use weird night rhythms to bother their 2-years-old baby.
The special mission for you is to defeat those night monsters that will sing along to an addicted dark melody.

New mode :
- Two player mode : each player play in up and down side of screen
- Shotting mode : use gun and shoot to the beat
- Hop mode : control ball jump on tile follow the beat
- Character selection
- Challenge : add new level
- Add story mode : play each week in story mode

HOW TO PLAY?
- Tap color arrows to rock all beats when they perfectly match.
- Ugh? Tiny tips: Hold for the long notes to get the highest score.
- Feel the rhythm! Defeat all enemies! Climb to the top of rank!

GAME FEATURE
- Easy to play everywhere anytime
- Online/Offline mode is available
- Difficulty increase follow each song
- High-quality music source is provided
- Challenges are being updated frequently!

Download now! Enjoy your best time ever!
